thread.title: At old racetrack site, dense development is suburbia’s best bet
thread.title_full: At old racetrack site, dense development is suburbia’s best bet - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John King
title: At old racetrack site, dense development is suburbia’s best bet
text:
Photo: Nathaniel Y. Downes, The Chronicle An exercise class moves to the beat of samba and salsa in one of the many parks in the emerging Bay Meadows infill community, which has replaced the old Bay Meadows racetrack. An exercise class moves to the beat of samba and salsa in one of...
The buildings and parks that are replacing the Bay Meadows racetrack in San Mateo show how far suburbs have come in adjusting to 21st century lifestyles — and how far they still have to go. An exercise class moves to the beat of samba and salsa in one of the many parks in the emerging Bay Meadows infill community, which has replaced the old Bay Meadows racetrack.
